module: Module-level comment: The `seven_segment_LED` module converts a 20-bit input `num` to a 42-bit seven-segment LED display encoding `segs`. It synchronizes updates with `clk` and resets with `rst_n`. Using internal buffer `lnum`, it processes `num` digit-by-digit aligning with `ctable` configurations for LED encoding. Triggered on clock rise or reset fall, it efficiently maps digits to their seven-segment representations.
